sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: Targeted Degradation of CTCF Decouples Local Insulation of Chromosome Domains from Genomic Compartmentalization. Nora EP, Goloborodko A, Valton AL, Gibcus JH, Uebersohn A, Abdennur N, Dekker J, Mirny LA, Bruneau BG. Cell. 2017 May 18;169(5):930-944.e22. doi: 10.1016/j.cell.2017.05.004. 10.1016/j.cell.2017.05.004 PubMed 28525758

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Bovine growth hormone terminator, reverse primer. Also called BGH reverse
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: BGH-rev
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: BGH-rev

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: supports FLP-mediated excision but not integration (Turan and Bode, 2011)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: FRT (minimal)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:bound_moiety: FLP recombinase from the Saccharomyces cerevisiae 2u plasmid
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: FRT (minimal)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: CAP binding site
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: CAP binding activates transcription in the presence of cAMP.
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: CAP binding site

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lac operator

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: promoter for the E. coli lac operon
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lac promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac promoter

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: M13 fwd
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: M13 fwd
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: common sequencing primer, one of multiple similar variants

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: f1 ori
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: f1 ori
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: f1 bacteriophage origin of replication; arrow indicates direction of (+) strand synthesis

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: M13 Reverse
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: In lacZ gene. Also called M13-rev
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: M13 Reverse

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: For distinguishing EGFP variants, reverse primer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: EXFP-R

T7 promoter

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: promoter for bacteriophage T3 RNA polymerase
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: T3 promoter
AmpR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to ampicillin, carbenicillin, and related antibiotics
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AmpR

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: common sequencing primer, one of multiple similar variants
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: SK primer

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: M13 rev

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: the original enhanced GFP (Yang et al., 1996)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: EGFP
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: EGFP

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: Targeting vector to introduce an AID-eGFP cassette at the mouse CTCF locus using puromycine selection. Auxin-inducible degron system.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:academicNonprofitTerms: UBMTA Ancillary Agreement for Plasmids Containing FP Materials

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: FRT (minimal)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: supports FLP-mediated excision but not integration (Turan and Bode, 2011)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:bound_moiety: FLP recombinase from the Saccharomyces cerevisiae 2u plasmid
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: FRT (minimal)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Puromycin resistance gene, reverse primer. Also called puro-variant-R
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: Puro-R
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: Puro-R

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: M13 Forward
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: In lacZ gene. Also called M13-F20 or M13 (-21) Forward
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: M13 Forward

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: MSCV-rev
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: MSCV-rev
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Murine stem cell virus, reverse primer

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pEN84 - CTCF-AID[71-114]-eGFP-FRT-Puro-FRT targeting construct was a gift from Benoit Bruneau (Addgene plasmid # 86230 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:86230 ; RRID:Addgene_86230)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Targeting vector to introduce an AID-eGFP cassette at the mouse CTCF locus using puromycine selection. Auxin-inducible degron system..
